title: Eclectic Milwuakee Escape in Historic Third Ward Neighbourhood with Rooftop Bar & Restaurant
description: Kimpton The Journeyman Hotel, an IHG Hotel, in the heart Milwaukee's Historic Third Ward neighbourhood, puts you at the doorstep of galleries, art studios, breweries and eateries galore. Onsite, enjoy exquisite Mediterranean-inspired Modern American dining at Tre Rivali - on fine days, sit on the outdoor patio for a spot of people-watching along Broadway. As night falls, head to The Outsider rooftop with cabana-style seats and firepits to stay toasty warm as you watch the sunset.
location_description: Kimpton Journeyman Hotel, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 310 E. Chicago Street, Milwaukee, Wisconsin 53202, United States
